net.livebookstore.web.service
Interface BookstoreWebService

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookstoreWebServiceImpl
public interface BookstoreWebService

Live Bookstore's WebService, perform a search.

Author:
Xuefeng

Method Summary
 SearchResult search(java.lang.String keyword, int pageIndex)
          Do a search with specified keyword and page.
 

Method Detail

search

SearchResult search(java.lang.String keyword,
                    int pageIndex)
Do a search with specified keyword and page. The default page index should be 1.

Parameters:
keyword - Keyword to search.
pageIndex - Which page.
Returns:
A SearchResult object that contains search informations.
